medications.name: 5-Amino 1MQ
medications.description: 5-Amino-1MQ is a small molecule peptide that acts as an inhibitor of the enzyme nicotinamide N-methyltransferase (NNMT), which plays a role in cellular metabolism and energy regulation. By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.
medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.name: Anastrozole
medications.description: A medication used to manage estrogen levels in men undergoing testosterone replacement therapy (TRT). It works as an aromatase inhibitor, blocking the conversion of testosterone to estrogen, thereby maintaining optimal hormonal balance.
medications.indication: Designed to maintain hormonal balance by managing estrogen levels. By reducing excess estrogen, Anastrozole helps improve energy, mood, and muscle definition while minimizing side effects like water retention or fatigue.

medications.name: BPC-157
medications.description: BPC-157 Therapy offers cutting-edge treatment designed to support healing, recovery, and overall wellness.
medications.indication: BPC-157 therapy promotes tissue repair, reduces inflammation, and enhances recovery from injuries or physical strain.

medications.name: DHEA
medications.description: A hormone produced by the adrenal glands. It serves as a precursor to sex hormones like testosterone and estrogen and counterbalances cortisol, the stress hormone.
medications.indication: Restores hormonal balance, boosts energy, mood, and sexual health. Enhances stress resilience, immunity, and overall well-being, essential for longevity and performance optimization.

medications.name: Enclomiphene
medications.description: A selective estrogen receptor modulator (SERM) used to increase testosterone production in men by stimulating the natural production of luteinizing hormone (LH) and follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH).
medications.indication: A powerful testosterone booster that enhances natural production while supporting fertility. Unlike traditional options, Enclomiphene helps maintain testicular function and sperm count, ensuring optimized hormone levels without compromising reproductive health.

medications.name: SS-31 (Elamipretide)
medications.description: SS-31 (Elamipretide) is a cutting-edge mitochondrial peptide with wide-ranging benefits in cellular energy, aging, inflammation, and neuroprotection. By targeting and stabilizing mitochondrial membranes, it holds unique promise for individuals dealing with chronic fatigue, inflammation, autoimmune conditions, or degenerative diseases.
medications.indication: SS-31 is indicated for any condition driven by mitochondrial dysfunction, especially where oxidative stress, energy failure, or age-related decline are involved. While still investigational, it is gaining popularity in integrative medicine, anti-aging, neurodegenerative care, and fatigue recovery protocols due to its direct mitochondrial repair mechanism.

medications.name: Oxytocin
medications.description: Oxytocin is a naturally occurring hormone and neuropeptide produced in the hypothalamus and released by the pituitary gland. Often called the "bonding" or "love hormone," it plays a key role in social connection, emotional regulation, trust, and sexual intimacy.
medications.indication: In functional medicine, oxytocin is used off-label as a therapeutic tool to support emotional, cognitive, and relational well-being, especially when dysregulation of the stress-response system, social engagement, or mood balance is present.

medications.name: PT-141 (Bremelanotide)
medications.description: PT-141 (Bremelanotide) is a synthetic peptide used to enhance sexual arousal and libido in both men and women. Unlike other sexual function medications that target blood flow (like Viagra), PT-141 acts directly on the central nervous system, specifically the hypothalamus, to stimulate desire.
medications.indication: PT-141 (Bremelanotide) is indicated for the treatment of hypoactive sexual desire disorder (HSDD) in premenopausal women and is used off-label in both men and women to enhance libido, arousal, and sexual satisfaction. In functional medicine, it is commonly prescribed for individuals experiencing low sexual desire, erectile dysfunction, or arousal difficulties, including those related to SSRI use or hormonal imbalance. Unlike PDE5 inhibitors, PT-141 works by activating melanocortin receptors in the brain, stimulating sexual desire at the central nervous system level.

medications.name: Epitalon
medications.description: Epitalon (Epithalon) is a synthetic tetrapeptide (Ala-Glu-Asp-Gly) derived from Epithalamin, a natural peptide produced in the pineal gland. It has a role in regulating telomerase activity, promoting cellular longevity, and modulating circadian rhythms. Epitalon is considered a potential anti-aging compound due to its effects on telomere maintenance, oxidative stress reduction, and endocrine system regulation.
medications.indication: Epitalon has been studied for its ability to activate telomerase, an enzyme that maintains telomere length, potentially slowing cellular aging and promoting longevity.

medications.name: GHK-Cu Peptide Treatment
medications.description: GHK-Cu Peptide is a powerful tripeptide bonded with copper ions, known for its ability to stimulate collagen production, support tissue repair, and combat signs of aging. Backed by decades of scientific research, GHK-Cu is safe for all skin types and a key component in anti-aging and regenerative treatments.
medications.indication: Clinically researched, it improves skin elasticity, reduces wrinkles, balances pigmentation, and promotes hair follicle repair for thicker, healthier hair. Additionally, it accelerates wound healing, reduces inflammation, and strengthens antioxidant defenses, making it ideal for post-procedure recovery and calming irritated skin.

medications.name: 1-MNA, NMN, Leucine Capsules
medications.description: 1-MNA is a metabolite of nicotinamide with anti-inflammatory, vasoprotective, and potential longevity-enhancing properties. NMN is a direct precursor to NAD+ (nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide), a critical coenzyme involved in cellular energy metabolism, mitochondrial function, and aging-related processes. Leucine is a branched-chain amino acid (BCAA) that serves as a key regulator of muscle protein synthesis via the mTOR pathway. It is essential for muscle growth, repair, and recovery. Leucine also plays a role in glucose metabolism and insulin signaling.
medications.indication: Metabolic, Vascular, Anti-inflammatory and Anti-Aging Support

medications.name: Compounded T3/T4 Thyroid Medication
medications.description: Compounded T3/T4 is a customized thyroid hormone medication containing a specific ratio of liothyronine (T3) and levothyroxine (T4), formulated by a compounding pharmacy to meet individual patient needs when commercially available options are not ideal.
medications.indication: Indicated for the treatment of hypothyroidism in patients requiring a personalized ratio of T3 and T4 to restore optimal thyroid function. It is beneficial for individuals who do not respond adequately to T4-only therapy, experience persistent hypothyroid symptoms, or need a formulation free of allergens or specific excipients.

medications.name: 5-Amino 1MQ
medications.description: 5-Amino-1MQ is a small molecule peptide that acts as an inhibitor of the enzyme nicotinamide N-methyltransferase (NNMT), which plays a role in cellular metabolism and energy regulation. By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.

medications.name: Hexarelin
medications.description: Hexarelin is a peptide designed to stimulate the release of growth hormone, promoting muscle growth, fat reduction, and faster recovery. With its potent regenerative effects, Hexarelin is a versatile peptide for those seeking improved physical performance and resilience.
medications.indication: Hexarelin strengthens connective tissues, supports joint health, and may improve cardiovascular function by promoting cardiac repair and protection. Known for its ability to enhance strength and energy, Hexarelin is commonly used for anti-aging, athletic performance, and injury recovery.

medications.name: Macimorelin
medications.description: Macimorelin is an orally active ghrelin receptor agonist that stimulates the release of growth hormone (GH) from the pituitary gland. It mimics the natural hormone ghrelin, promoting GH secretion and is used in diagnostic testing for adult growth hormone deficiency (AGHD).
medications.indication: Macimorelin is primarily indicated for the diagnosis of adult growth hormone deficiency (AGHD) through a GH stimulation test. It may also have potential off-label applications in research related to GH modulation, metabolism, and aging.

medications.name: Nandrolone Decanoate

medications.name: Semax
medications.description: Semax is a synthetic peptide administered primarily as a nasal spray for rapid absorption into the central nervous system. It is known for its nootropic and neuroprotective effects, helping to improve focus, memory, and mental clarity. Semax works by enhancing brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF), supporting dopamine and serotonin balance, and reducing oxidative stress. In functional medicine, Semax may also support cortisol regulation indirectly by modulating the HPA axis, helping the body adapt to chronic stress and reducing mental fatigue often associated with elevated or dysregulated cortisol levels.
medications.indication: Semax is primarily indicated for cognitive enhancement, neuroprotection, and stress adaptation. It is used to support memory, focus, and mental performance, particularly in situations of chronic stress, fatigue, or cognitive decline. In functional and longevity medicine, it may also be used to modulate the stress response and support cortisol regulation by promoting optimal HPA axis function, making it beneficial for individuals experiencing mental fatigue, burnout, or dysregulated stress hormone patterns.

medications.name: Epitalon
medications.description: Epitalon (Epithalon) is a synthetic tetrapeptide (Ala-Glu-Asp-Gly) derived from Epithalamin, a natural peptide produced in the pineal gland. It has a role in regulating telomerase activity, promoting cellular longevity, and modulating circadian rhythms. Epitalon is considered a potential anti-aging compound due to its effects on telomere maintenance, oxidative stress reduction, and endocrine system regulation.
medications.indication: Epitalon has been studied for its ability to activate telomerase, an enzyme that maintains telomere length, potentially slowing cellular aging and promoting longevity.

medications.name: Methylene Blue
medications.description: Methylene Blue is a synthetic compound with a rich history in medical applications, recently gaining attention for its potential anti-aging benefits.
medications.indication: Cognitive Function: Research indicates that methylene blue may support brain health by improving mitochondrial function, leading to enhanced energy production in brain cells. This improvement could aid in preserving cognitive abilities and potentially offer neuroprotective effects against age-related decline.

medications.name: Selank
medications.description: A synthetic peptide developed as an analog of the naturally occurring immunomodulatory peptide tuftsin. Selank exhibits pronounced anxiolytic (anti-anxiety) effects without the sedative and dependency side effects commonly associated with traditional tranquilizers. Additionally, it has demonstrated nootropic properties, enhancing cognitive functions such as memory and learning.
medications.indication: Selank is used to support anxiety relief, cognitive enhancement, and stress management. This synthetic peptide promotes a calming effect without sedation, improves memory and focus, and helps regulate the body's stress response for overall mental well-being.

medications.name: TB-400 / TB-500
medications.description: TB-400/500 is a synthetic fragment of thymosin beta-4 (specifically the 17-23 segment), designed to replicate its active region. medications.indication: TB-400/500 therapy helps reduce inflammation, accelerate tissue repair, and improve endurance, making it an ideal choice for those seeking optimal recovery and resilience.

medications.name: hCG
medications.description: hCG (human chorionic gonadotropin) is a natural hormone that helps support your body's own testosterone and fertility. Often used in hormone replacement therapy (HRT) to boost Testosterone levels and/or gonadal support.
medications.indication:
Testosterone therapy alone can sometimes lower your body’s natural hormone production and reduce fertility. hCG helps keep everything working as naturally as possible while you get the benefits of HRT.

Keep your testicles active while on testosterone therapy; support sperm production and fertility; prevent testicle shrinkage; boost natural testosterone in some cases; improve energy, mood, and libido

In women, it can help with fertility and ovulation support during treatment.

tests.indication: Ideal for those addressing gut issues, digestive health, or immune function concerns.

medications.name: Larazotide (AT-1001)
medications.description: Larazotide (AT-1001) is an oral peptide that helps regulate intestinal permeability by modulating tight junctions in the gut lining. It is primarily researched for its role in managing leaky gut syndrome, celiac disease, and other inflammatory gut disorders. By preventing the breakdown of tight junctions, Larazotide supports gut barrier integrity, reduces inflammation, and may help mitigate symptoms related to increased intestinal permeability.
medications.indication: Larazotide (AT-1001) 500mcg is indicated for individuals with conditions linked to increased intestinal permeability, such as celiac disease, leaky gut syndrome, inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), and autoimmune disorders. By modulating tight junctions in the gut lining, it helps reduce inflammation, support barrier integrity, and mitigate symptoms like bloating, brain fog, and digestive discomfort. It may also benefit metabolic and neurological conditions related to gut health, making it a promising adjunct therapy for those with chronic inflammation and immune dysregulation.

medications.name: Oral BPC-KPV
medications.description: Oral BPC-KPV is a peptide-based therapy that combines BPC-157, known for its regenerative and anti-inflammatory properties, with KPV, a potent tripeptide derived from alpha-melanocyte-stimulating hormone (α-MSH) that helps modulate immune response and reduce inflammation. This combination is designed to support gut health, tissue repair, and immune regulation, making it a promising option for individuals with gastrointestinal disorders, inflammatory conditions, and musculoskeletal injuries.
medications.indication: Oral BPC-KPV is indicated for individuals seeking support for gut health, immune modulation, and tissue repair. It is commonly used for conditions such as inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), leaky gut syndrome, gastritis, and other gastrointestinal disorders, as well as chronic inflammation and musculoskeletal injuries. By reducing inflammation, promoting cellular repair, and enhancing gut barrier integrity, BPC-KPV may aid in recovery from injury, optimize gut function, and support overall systemic healing.

supplements.name: Sunfiber
supplements.description: Sunfiber is a soluble, partially hydrolyzed guar gum (PHGG) that functions as a gentle prebiotic fiber. It dissolves easily in liquids, is tasteless, and ferments slowly in the gut, minimizing gas and bloating.
supplements.indication: Sunfiber is indicated to promote healthy gut microbiota balance, improve stool regularity, and support digestive comfort. It is especially beneficial for individuals with dysbiosis, IBS, or sensitive digestion, as it gently feeds beneficial bacteria without causing excess gas or bloating.

supplements.name: Oil of Oregano
supplements.description: Oil of oregano is a potent herbal extract derived from the oregano plant, rich in compounds like carvacrol and thymol, which have strong antibacterial, antifungal, and antioxidant properties. It is commonly used in integrative medicine to help combat microbial overgrowth and support immune function.
supplements.indication: Oil of oregano is indicated for its natural antimicrobial properties, helping to reduce harmful bacteria, yeast, and parasites in the gut. It is often used in cases of bacterial overgrowth, fungal infections, or digestive imbalance, and can support overall immune and gut health when used short term as part of a targeted protocol.

medications.description: 5-Amino-1MQ is a small molecule peptide that acts as an inhibitor of the enzyme nicotinamide N-methyltransferase (NNMT), which plays a role in cellular metabolism and energy regulation. medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.name: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN)
medications.description: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN) is a compounded formulation of naltrexone, an opioid receptor antagonist, typically dosed between 0.5 mg and 4.5 mg. Unlike standard naltrexone dosing used for addiction treatment, LDN works by transiently blocking opioid receptors, leading to a rebound increase in endogenous endorphin and enkephalin production. This modulation of the immune system and inflammation pathways has shown therapeutic benefits in a range of chronic conditions.
medications.indication: Indicated for the management of autoimmune disorders, chronic pain syndromes, and inflammatory conditions. It is particularly beneficial for conditions such as multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis, Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, fibromyalgia, or irritable bowel syndrome. LDN helps reduce systemic inflammation, modulate immune responses, and improve symptom control, with potential neuroprotective and mood-enhancing effects.

supplements.name: DIM
supplements.description: DIM is a compound formed in the body when digesting indole-3-carbinol, which is naturally found in cruciferous vegetables like broccoli, cauliflower, kale, and Brussels sprouts. It’s often used in supplementation form for hormone balance, detoxification, and metabolic health.
supplements.indication: DIM (Diindolylmethane) helps the body process and balance estrogen in a healthier way. It supports hormone balance in both women and men, promotes natural detox of “bad” estrogens and environmental toxins, may reduce risks tied to hormone-related cancers, and can help with symptoms of estrogen dominance such as PMS, weight gain, fibroids, or hormonal acne. It’s also supportive for men on testosterone therapy and for overall hormone metabolism and immune balance.

medications.name: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide)
medications.description:
NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience.

NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration. Supplementation or restoration of NAD+ is used in functional medicine to support energy, brain function, detoxification, and overall cellular health.
medications.indication: NAD+ is indicated to support cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: 5-Amino 1MQ

By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.
medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.indication: Indicated for the treatment of hypothyroidism in patients requiring a personalized ratio of T3 and T4 to restore optimal thyroid function. It is beneficial for individuals who do not respond adequately to T4-only therapy, experience persistent hypothyroid symptoms, or need a formulation free of allergens or specific excipients.

medications.name: MOTS-c
medications.description: MOTS-c is a mitochondrial-derived peptide composed of 16 amino acids, encoded within the mitochondrial genome. It regulates metabolic homeostasis, cellular energy production, and mitochondrial function by activating AMPK (AMP-activated protein kinase), a critical energy-sensing enzyme involved in cellular metabolism, insulin sensitivity, fat oxidation, and glucose uptake.
medications.indication: Supports metabolic health, enhances mitochondrial function, and improves energy production. Indicated for patients with metabolic dysfunction, insulin resistance, weight loss resistance, or chronic fatigue. MOTS-c improves glucose utilization, increases fat oxidation, reduces inflammation, and supports healthy aging and exercise recovery.

medications.name: LR3 IGF-1
medications.description: LR3 IGF-1 (Long R3 Insulin-like Growth Factor 1) is a synthetic analog of IGF-1 with a modified amino acid sequence that significantly increases its stability and bioavailability. Unlike native IGF-1, LR3 IGF-1 resists binding to IGF-binding proteins, allowing for a prolonged half-life and more potent biological activity. It activates IGF-1 receptors to stimulate muscle growth, tissue repair, and cellular regeneration, while also enhancing nutrient uptake and improving insulin sensitivity. Due to its powerful anabolic properties, LR3 IGF-1 is commonly researched in the contexts of performance enhancement, anti-aging, and recovery optimization.
medications.indication: Promotes muscle hypertrophy, accelerates recovery, and supports tissue regeneration by activating IGF-1 receptors and increasing protein synthesis. Its resistance to IGF-binding proteins makes it ideal for protocols involving muscle growth, injury recovery, metabolic enhancement, and cellular repair.

medications.name: LR3 IGF-1
medications.description: LR3 IGF-1 (Long R3 Insulin-like Growth Factor 1) is a synthetic analog of IGF-1 with a modified amino acid sequence that significantly increases its stability and bioavailability. Unlike native IGF-1, LR3 IGF-1 resists binding to IGF-binding proteins, allowing for a prolonged half-life and more potent biological activity. It activates IGF-1 receptors to stimulate muscle growth, tissue repair, and cellular regeneration, while also enhancing nutrient uptake and improving insulin sensitivity. Due to its powerful anabolic properties, LR3 IGF-1 is commonly researched in the contexts of performance enhancement, anti-aging, and recovery optimization.
medications.indication: Promotes muscle hypertrophy, accelerates recovery, and supports tissue regeneration by activating IGF-1 receptors and increasing protein synthesis. Its resistance to IGF-binding proteins makes it ideal for protocols involving muscle growth, injury recovery, metabolic enhancement, and cellular repair.

medications.name: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide)
medications.description:
NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience.
NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration. Supplementation or restoration of NAD+ is used in functional medicine to support energy, brain function, detoxification, and overall cellular health.
medications.indication: NAD+ is indicated to support cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: LR3 IGF-1
medications.description: LR3 IGF-1 (Long R3 Insulin-like Growth Factor 1) is a synthetic analog of IGF-1 with a modified amino acid sequence that significantly increases its stability and bioavailability. Unlike native IGF-1, LR3 IGF-1 resists binding to IGF-binding proteins, allowing for a prolonged half-life and more potent biological activity. It activates IGF-1 receptors to stimulate muscle growth, tissue repair, and cellular regeneration, while also enhancing nutrient uptake and improving insulin sensitivity. Due to its powerful anabolic properties, LR3 IGF-1 is commonly researched in the contexts of performance enhancement, anti-aging, and recovery optimization.
medications.indication: Promotes muscle hypertrophy, accelerates recovery, and supports tissue regeneration by activating IGF-1 receptors and increasing protein synthesis. Its resistance to IGF-binding proteins makes it ideal for protocols involving muscle growth, injury recovery, metabolic enhancement, and cellular repair.

medications.name: NAD+
medications.description: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience. NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration.
medications.indication: Supports cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: Larazotide (AT-1001)
medications.description: Larazotide (AT-1001) is an oral peptide that helps regulate intestinal permeability by modulating tight junctions in the gut lining. It is primarily researched for its role in managing leaky gut syndrome, celiac disease, and other inflammatory gut disorders. By preventing the breakdown of tight junctions, Larazotide supports gut barrier integrity, reduces inflammation, and may help mitigate symptoms related to increased intestinal permeability.
medications.indication: Larazotide (AT-1001) 500mcg is indicated for individuals with conditions linked to increased intestinal permeability, such as celiac disease, leaky gut syndrome, inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), and autoimmune disorders. By modulating tight junctions in the gut lining, it helps reduce inflammation, support barrier integrity, and mitigate symptoms like bloating, brain fog, and digestive discomfort. It may also benefit metabolic and neurological conditions related to gut health, making it a promising adjunct therapy for those with chronic inflammation and immune dysregulation.

medications.name: Hair Growth Solution
medications.description: This is a powerful, prescription-strength topical treatment designed to target the root causes of hair thinning and promote healthier, fuller hair growth.
medications.indication:
Minoxidil: Increases blood flow to hair follicles to stimulate new growth.
Finasteride: Blocks DHT (a hormone that causes hair follicles to shrink) to slow or stop shedding.
Azelaic Acid: Supports scalp health and further helps lower DHT levels.
Ketoconazole: Reduces scalp inflammation and controls yeast that can contribute to hair loss.

Recommended for men and women with pattern hair loss (androgenetic alopecia) or thinning hair who want to slow shedding, strengthen existing hair, and encourage regrowth.

medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.description: A medication used to manage estrogen levels in men undergoing testosterone replacement therapy (TRT). It works as an aromatase inhibitor, blocking the conversion of testosterone to estrogen, thereby maintaining optimal hormonal balance.
medications.indication: Designed to maintain hormonal balance by managing estrogen levels. By reducing excess estrogen, Anastrozole helps improve energy, mood, and muscle definition while minimizing side effects like water retention or fatigue.

medications.name: Glutathione

medications.name: NAD+
medications.description: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience. NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration.
medications.indication: Supports cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: Oral BPC-KPV
medications.description: Oral BPC-KPV is a peptide-based therapy that combines BPC-157, known for its regenerative and anti-inflammatory properties, with KPV, a potent tripeptide derived from alpha-melanocyte-stimulating hormone (α-MSH) that helps modulate immune response and reduce inflammation. This combination is designed to support gut health, tissue repair, and immune regulation, making it a promising option for individuals with gastrointestinal disorders, inflammatory conditions, and musculoskeletal injuries.
medications.indication: Oral BPC-KPV is indicated for individuals seeking support for gut health, immune modulation, and tissue repair. It is commonly used for conditions such as inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), leaky gut syndrome, gastritis, and other gastrointestinal disorders, as well as chronic inflammation and musculoskeletal injuries. By reducing inflammation, promoting cellular repair, and enhancing gut barrier integrity, BPC-KPV may aid in recovery from injury, optimize gut function, and support overall systemic healing.

By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.
medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.name: NAD+
medications.description: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience. NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration.
medications.indication: Supports cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: PT-141 (Bremelanotide)
medications.description: PT-141 (Bremelanotide) is a synthetic peptide used to enhance sexual arousal and libido in both men and women. Unlike other sexual function medications that target blood flow (like Viagra), PT-141 acts directly on the central nervous system, specifically the hypothalamus, to stimulate desire.
medications.indication: Treatment of hypoactive sexual desire disorder (HSDD) in premenopausal women and is used off-label in both men and women to enhance libido, arousal, and sexual satisfaction. In functional medicine, it is commonly prescribed for individuals experiencing low sexual desire, erectile dysfunction, or arousal difficulties, including those related to SSRI use or hormonal imbalance.

medications.name: LR3 IGF-1
medications.description: LR3 IGF-1 (Long R3 Insulin-like Growth Factor 1) is a synthetic analog of IGF-1 with a modified amino acid sequence that significantly increases its stability and bioavailability. Unlike native IGF-1, LR3 IGF-1 resists binding to IGF-binding proteins, allowing for a prolonged half-life and more potent biological activity. It activates IGF-1 receptors to stimulate muscle growth, tissue repair, and cellular regeneration, while also enhancing nutrient uptake and improving insulin sensitivity. Due to its powerful anabolic properties, LR3 IGF-1 is commonly researched in the contexts of performance enhancement, anti-aging, and recovery optimization.
medications.indication: Promotes muscle hypertrophy, accelerates recovery, and supports tissue regeneration by activating IGF-1 receptors and increasing protein synthesis. Its resistance to IGF-binding proteins makes it ideal for protocols involving muscle growth, injury recovery, metabolic enhancement, and cellular repair.

medications.name: Larazotide (AT-1001)
medications.description: Larazotide (AT-1001) is an oral peptide that helps regulate intestinal permeability by modulating tight junctions in the gut lining. It is primarily researched for its role in managing leaky gut syndrome, celiac disease, and other inflammatory gut disorders. By preventing the breakdown of tight junctions, Larazotide supports gut barrier integrity, reduces inflammation, and may help mitigate symptoms related to increased intestinal permeability.
medications.indication: Larazotide (AT-1001) 500mcg is indicated for individuals with conditions linked to increased intestinal permeability, such as celiac disease, leaky gut syndrome, inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), and autoimmune disorders. By modulating tight junctions in the gut lining, it helps reduce inflammation, support barrier integrity, and mitigate symptoms like bloating, brain fog, and digestive discomfort. It may also benefit metabolic and neurological conditions related to gut health, making it a promising adjunct therapy for those with chronic inflammation and immune dysregulation.

supplements.name: Pancreatic Enzymes
supplements.description: Pancreatic enzyme supplements help your body break down food when your pancreas isn’t making enough enzymes. They support digestion by improving the breakdown of fats, proteins, and carbohydrates. This can reduce bloating, gas, and nutrient deficiencies, making it easier for your body to absorb vitamins, minerals, and energy from the food you eat.
supplements.indication: Pancreatic enzyme supplements are indicated for people with pancreatic insufficiency, such as those with chronic pancreatitis, cystic fibrosis, pancreatic cancer, or after pancreatic surgery. They’re used when the pancreas cannot produce enough digestive enzymes, leading to malabsorption, weight loss, diarrhea, and nutrient deficiencies. Supplementation helps restore normal digestion and nutrient absorption.

supplements.name: GLP-1 Probiotic Pro
supplements.description: A specialized probiotic blend formulated to enhance gut health and improve gastrointestinal tolerance in individuals using GLP-1 agonists.
supplements.indication: Enhance your GLP-1 journey with our Probiotic Support.

supplements.name: Sunfiber
supplements.description: Sunfiber is a soluble, partially hydrolyzed guar gum (PHGG) that functions as a gentle prebiotic fiber. It dissolves easily in liquids, is tasteless, and ferments slowly in the gut, minimizing gas and bloating.
supplements.indication: Promotes healthy gut microbiota balance, improve stool regularity, and support digestive comfort. It is especially beneficial for individuals with dysbiosis, IBS, or sensitive digestion, as it gently feeds beneficial bacteria without causing excess gas or bloating.

medications.name: 5-Amino 1MQ
medications.description: 5-Amino-1MQ is a small molecule peptide that acts as an inhibitor of the enzyme nicotinamide N-methyltransferase (NNMT), which plays a role in cellular metabolism and energy regulation. By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.
medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.name: Oxandrolone
medications.description: Oxandrolone Therapy offers a powerful solution for enhancing recovery, strength, and lean muscle preservation during your TRT journey. Delivered with guided medical oversight, convenient telemedicine visits, and streamlined access through our patient portal app, this therapy is tailored for individuals seeking optimal performance and resilience.
medications.indication: Oxandrolone therapy is known for its ability to promote tissue repair, increase strength, and preserve lean muscle mass, even during caloric deficits or recovery phases. medications.name: Testosterone Injectable
medications.description: An injectable form of testosterone replacement therapy that delivers consistent hormone levels.
medications.indication: A powerful, direct approach to optimizing testosterone for peak strength, vitality, and a leaner physique.

medications.name: LR3 IGF-1
medications.description: LR3 IGF-1 (Long R3 Insulin-like Growth Factor 1) is a synthetic analog of IGF-1 with a modified amino acid sequence that significantly increases its stability and bioavailability. Unlike native IGF-1, LR3 IGF-1 resists binding to IGF-binding proteins, allowing for a prolonged half-life and more potent biological activity. It activates IGF-1 receptors to stimulate muscle growth, tissue repair, and cellular regeneration, while also enhancing nutrient uptake and improving insulin sensitivity. Due to its powerful anabolic properties, LR3 IGF-1 is commonly researched in the contexts of performance enhancement, anti-aging, and recovery optimization.
medications.indication: Promotes muscle hypertrophy, accelerates recovery, and supports tissue regeneration by activating IGF-1 receptors and increasing protein synthesis. Its resistance to IGF-binding proteins makes it ideal for protocols involving muscle growth, injury recovery, metabolic enhancement, and cellular repair.

medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.name: Oxandrolone
medications.description: Oxandrolone Therapy offers a powerful solution for enhancing recovery, strength, and lean muscle preservation during your TRT journey. Delivered with guided medical oversight, convenient telemedicine visits, and streamlined access through our patient portal app, this therapy is tailored for individuals seeking optimal performance and resilience.
medications.indication: Oxandrolone therapy is known for its ability to promote tissue repair, increase strength, and preserve lean muscle mass, even during caloric deficits or recovery phases. Its mild profile and targeted benefits make it an ideal addition to testosterone replacement therapy, helping you recover faster, maintain muscle integrity.

medications.name: Testosterone Injectable

medications.indication: A powerful, direct approach to optimizing testosterone for peak strength, vitality, and a leaner physique.

medications.name: LR3 IGF-1
medications.description: LR3 IGF-1 (Long R3 Insulin-like Growth Factor 1) is a synthetic analog of IGF-1 with a modified amino acid sequence that significantly increases its stability and bioavailability. Unlike native IGF-1, LR3 IGF-1 resists binding to IGF-binding proteins, allowing for a prolonged half-life and more potent biological activity. It activates IGF-1 receptors to stimulate muscle growth, tissue repair, and cellular regeneration, while also enhancing nutrient uptake and improving insulin sensitivity. Due to its powerful anabolic properties, LR3 IGF-1 is commonly researched in the contexts of performance enhancement, anti-aging, and recovery optimization.
medications.indication: Promotes muscle hypertrophy, accelerates recovery, and supports tissue regeneration by activating IGF-1 receptors and increasing protein synthesis. Its resistance to IGF-binding proteins makes it ideal for protocols involving muscle growth, injury recovery, metabolic enhancement, and cellular repair.

medications.name: Hexarelin

medications.indication: Hexarelin strengthens connective tissues, supports joint health, and may improve cardiovascular function by promoting cardiac repair and protection. medications.name: PT-141 (Bremelanotide)
medications.description: PT-141 (Bremelanotide) is a synthetic peptide used to enhance sexual arousal and libido in both men and women. Unlike other sexual function medications that target blood flow (like Viagra), PT-141 acts directly on the central nervous system, specifically the hypothalamus, to stimulate desire.
medications.indication: Treatment of hypoactive sexual desire disorder (HSDD) in premenopausal women and is used off-label in both men and women to enhance libido, arousal, and sexual satisfaction. In functional medicine, it is commonly prescribed for individuals experiencing low sexual desire, erectile dysfunction, or arousal difficulties, including those related to SSRI use or hormonal imbalance.

supplements.name: Iron Bisglycinate
supplements.description: Thorne's Iron Bisgylcinate is NSF Certified for Sport®. It is essential for the formation of red blood cells.* The U.S. Centers for Disease Control has determined that the prevalence of iron deficiency is greatest among toddlers (7% of those ages 1-2 years) and menstruating adolescent and adult females (9-16 % of individuals ages 12-49, whether they are athletes or not. Conventional iron supplementation, including forms such as ferrous sulfate, can cause gastrointestinal side effects – including nausea, vomiting, constipation, diarrhea, and dark-colored stools – because these conventional forms of iron are poorly absorbed. Thorne's Iron Bisglycinate provides 25 mg of elemental iron per capsule that has been reacted with glycine for optimal absorption in the gastrointestinal tract, thus helping to decrease the typical gastrointestinal side effects.*
supplements.indication: Low iron can lead to a reduction in the body's normal uptake of oxygen to cells. A reduction of oxygen to cells can lead to a reduction in work capacity and aerobic performance. Untreated chronic low levels of iron can lead to iron deficient anemia.

medications.indication: Clinically researched, it improves skin elasticity, reduces wrinkles, balances pigmentation, and promotes hair follicle repair for thicker, healthier hair. Additionally, it accelerates wound healing, reduces inflammation, and strengthens antioxidant defenses, making it ideal for post-procedure recovery and calming irritated skin.

medications.name: Hair Growth Capsule - Biotin/Minoxidil
medications.description: Biotin and minoxidil are commonly paired in hair restoration treatments. Biotin, a B-vitamin, supports healthy hair growth by strengthening keratin structure. Minoxidil, a topical vasodilator, enhances blood flow to hair follicles, stimulating growth and slowing hair loss. Together, they promote thicker, healthier hair. This combination is ideal for individuals experiencing thinning or shedding, offering a science-backed, non-invasive approach to hair rejuvenation.
medications.indication: For individuals experiencing hair thinning, hair loss, or weakened hair structure due to nutritional deficiencies, androgenetic alopecia, or stress-related shedding. Minoxidil increases scalp blood flow and follicle activity to stimulate regrowth, while biotin strengthens hair shafts and supports keratin production. This combination helps restore hair density, reduce shedding, and promote fuller, healthier hair with continued use.

medications.name: LR3 IGF-1
medications.description: LR3 IGF-1 (Long R3 Insulin-like Growth Factor 1) is a synthetic analog of IGF-1 with a modified amino acid sequence that significantly increases its stability and bioavailability. Unlike native IGF-1, LR3 IGF-1 resists binding to IGF-binding proteins, allowing for a prolonged half-life and more potent biological activity. It activates IGF-1 receptors to stimulate muscle growth, tissue repair, and cellular regeneration, while also enhancing nutrient uptake and improving insulin sensitivity. Due to its powerful anabolic properties, LR3 IGF-1 is commonly researched in the contexts of performance enhancement, anti-aging, and recovery optimization.
medications.indication: Promotes muscle hypertrophy, accelerates recovery, and supports tissue regeneration by activating IGF-1 receptors and increasing protein synthesis. Its resistance to IGF-binding proteins makes it ideal for protocols involving muscle growth, injury recovery, metabolic enhancement, and cellular repair.

medications.name: Oral BPC-KPV
medications.description: Oral BPC-KPV is a peptide-based therapy that combines BPC-157, known for its regenerative and anti-inflammatory properties, with KPV, a potent tripeptide derived from alpha-melanocyte-stimulating hormone (α-MSH) that helps modulate immune response and reduce inflammation. This combination is designed to support gut health, tissue repair, and immune regulation, making it a promising option for individuals with gastrointestinal disorders, inflammatory conditions, and musculoskeletal injuries.
medications.indication: Oral BPC-KPV is indicated for individuals seeking support for gut health, immune modulation, and tissue repair. It is commonly used for conditions such as inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), leaky gut syndrome, gastritis, and other gastrointestinal disorders, as well as chronic inflammation and musculoskeletal injuries. By reducing inflammation, promoting cellular repair, and enhancing gut barrier integrity, BPC-KPV may aid in recovery from injury, optimize gut function, and support overall systemic healing.

medications.name: Vasoactive Intestinal Peptide
medications.description: Vasoactive Intestinal VIP) is a powerful neuropeptide that plays a key role in regulating inflammation, immune response, and vascular health. VIP therapy is commonly used to support optimal lung function, improve circulation, and enhance cognitive performance. It may also benefit individuals with chronic inflammatory conditions by helping to restore balance and improve overall well-being.
medications.indication: Whether you're seeking support for immune regulation or optimizing recovery, VIP therapy offers a targeted approach to help you feel your best.

supplements.name: L-Glutamine
supplements.description: L-Glutamine is a cornerstone in functional medicine, primarily valued for its critical role in supporting gut health, immune function, and recovery from stress or injury. It is particularly recognized for its ability to repair and maintain the integrity of the intestinal lining, making it a key supplement for conditions like leaky gut syndrome, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), and inflammatory bowel disease (IBD).
supplements.indication: L-Glutamine supports gut health by serving as a primary fuel for enterocytes and colonocytes, aiding in the repair of the intestinal barrier and reducing intestinal permeability.

medications.name: 5-Amino 1MQ
medications.description: 5-Amino-1MQ is a small molecule peptide that acts as an inhibitor of the enzyme nicotinamide N-methyltransferase (NNMT), which plays a role in cellular metabolism and energy regulation. By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.
medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.
medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.name: Glutathione
medications.description: Glutathione is a powerful antioxidant naturally produced in the body that plays a crucial role in detoxification, immune function, and cellular repair. It neutralizes harmful free radicals, reduces oxidative stress, and supports liver health, making it essential for overall wellness and anti-aging.
medications.indication: Glutathione helps brighten skin tone, reduce inflammation, and enhance recovery from physical stress. Widely studied for its benefits, it is a cornerstone of cellular defense and optimal health.

medications.name: Larazotide (AT-1001)
medications.description: Larazotide (AT-1001) is an oral peptide that helps regulate intestinal permeability by modulating tight junctions in the gut lining. It is primarily researched for its role in managing leaky gut syndrome, celiac disease, and other inflammatory gut disorders. By preventing the breakdown of tight junctions, Larazotide supports gut barrier integrity, reduces inflammation, and may help mitigate symptoms related to increased intestinal permeability.
medications.indication: Larazotide (AT-1001) 500mcg is indicated for individuals with conditions linked to increased intestinal permeability, such as celiac disease, leaky gut syndrome, inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), and autoimmune disorders. By modulating tight junctions in the gut lining, it helps reduce inflammation, support barrier integrity, and mitigate symptoms like bloating, brain fog, and digestive discomfort. It may also benefit metabolic and neurological conditions related to gut health, making it a promising adjunct therapy for those with chronic inflammation and immune dysregulation.

medications.name: Liothyronine
medications.description: A synthetic form of the thyroid hormone triiodothyronine (T₃), which plays a crucial role in regulating metabolism, growth, and development. It is commonly prescribed to address various thyroid-related conditions.
medications.indication: Liothyronine is used as replacement therapy in cases where the thyroid gland does not produce sufficient hormones, including primary (thyroidal), secondary (pituitary), and tertiary (hypothalamic) hypothyroidism.

medications.name: MOTS-c
medications.description: MOTS-c is a mitochondrial-derived peptide composed of 16 amino acids, encoded within the mitochondrial genome. It regulates metabolic homeostasis, cellular energy production, and mitochondrial function by activating AMPK (AMP-activated protein kinase), a critical energy-sensing enzyme involved in cellular metabolism, insulin sensitivity, fat oxidation, and glucose uptake.
medications.indication: Supports metabolic health, enhances mitochondrial function, and improves energy production. Indicated for patients with metabolic dysfunction, insulin resistance, weight loss resistance, or chronic fatigue. MOTS-c improves glucose utilization, increases fat oxidation, reduces inflammation, and supports healthy aging and exercise recovery.

medications.name: NAD+
medications.description: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience. NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration.
medications.indication: Supports cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: Oral BPC-KPV
medications.description: Oral BPC-KPV is a peptide-based therapy that combines BPC-157, known for its regenerative and anti-inflammatory properties, with KPV, a potent tripeptide derived from alpha-melanocyte-stimulating hormone (α-MSH) that helps modulate immune response and reduce inflammation. This combination is designed to support gut health, tissue repair, and immune regulation, making it a promising option for individuals with gastrointestinal disorders, inflammatory conditions, and musculoskeletal injuries.
medications.indication: Oral BPC-KPV is indicated for individuals seeking support for gut health, immune modulation, and tissue repair. It is commonly used for conditions such as inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), leaky gut syndrome, gastritis, and other gastrointestinal disorders, as well as chronic inflammation and musculoskeletal injuries. By reducing inflammation, promoting cellular repair, and enhancing gut barrier integrity, BPC-KPV may aid in recovery from injury, optimize gut function, and support overall systemic healing.

medications.name: Tirzepatide
medications.description: A novel dual-receptor agonist for weight management.
medications.indication: The dual-action GLP-1 and GIP receptor agonist. Tirzepatide targets multiple pathways to enhance appetite control, improve insulin sensitivity, and promote effective fat loss.

medications.name: Vasoactive Intestinal Peptide
medications.description: Vasoactive Intestinal VIP) is a powerful neuropeptide that plays a key role in regulating inflammation, immune response, and vascular health. VIP therapy is commonly used to support optimal lung function, improve circulation, and enhance cognitive performance. It may also benefit individuals with chronic inflammatory conditions by helping to restore balance and improve overall well-being.
medications.indication: Whether you're seeking support for immune regulation or optimizing recovery, VIP therapy offers a targeted approach to help you feel your best.

supplements.description: Oil of oregano is a potent herbal extract derived from the oregano plant, rich in compounds like carvacrol and thymol, which have strong antibacterial, antifungal, and antioxidant properties. It is commonly used in integrative medicine to help combat microbial overgrowth and support immune function.
supplements.indication: A natural antimicrobial, helping to reduce harmful bacteria, yeast, and parasites in the gut. It is often used in cases of bacterial overgrowth, fungal infections, or digestive imbalance, and can support overall immune and gut health when used short term as part of a targeted protocol.

supplements.name: Sunfiber
supplements.description: Sunfiber is a soluble, partially hydrolyzed guar gum (PHGG) that functions as a gentle prebiotic fiber. It dissolves easily in liquids, is tasteless, and ferments slowly in the gut, minimizing gas and bloating.
supplements.indication: Promotes healthy gut microbiota balance, improve stool regularity, and support digestive comfort. It is especially beneficial for individuals with dysbiosis, IBS, or sensitive digestion, as it gently feeds beneficial bacteria without causing excess gas or bloating.

medications.name: Oxytocin
medications.description: Oxytocin is a naturally occurring hormone and neuropeptide produced in the hypothalamus and released by the pituitary gland. Often called the 'bonding' or 'love hormone,' it plays a key role in social connection, emotional regulation, trust, and sexual intimacy.
medications.indication: In functional medicine, oxytocin is used off-label as a therapeutic tool to support emotional, cognitive, and relational well-being, especially when dysregulation of the stress-response system, social engagement, or mood balance is present.

medications.name: PT-141 (Bremelanotide)
medications.description: PT-141 (Bremelanotide) is a synthetic peptide used to enhance sexual arousal and libido in both men and women. Unlike other sexual function medications that target blood flow (like Viagra), PT-141 acts directly on the central nervous system, specifically the hypothalamus, to stimulate desire.
medications.indication: Treatment of hypoactive sexual desire disorder (HSDD) in premenopausal women and is used off-label in both men and women to enhance libido, arousal, and sexual satisfaction. In functional medicine, it is commonly prescribed for individuals experiencing low sexual desire, erectile dysfunction, or arousal difficulties, including those related to SSRI use or hormonal imbalance.

medications.name: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN)
medications.description: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN) is a compounded formulation of naltrexone, an opioid receptor antagonist, typically dosed between 0.5 mg and 4.5 mg. Unlike standard naltrexone dosing used for addiction treatment, LDN works by transiently blocking opioid receptors, leading to a rebound increase in endogenous endorphin and enkephalin production. This modulation of the immune system and inflammation pathways has shown therapeutic benefits in a range of chronic conditions.
medications.indication: Indicated for the management of autoimmune disorders, chronic pain syndromes, and inflammatory conditions. It is particularly beneficial for conditions such as multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis, Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, fibromyalgia, or irritable bowel syndrome. LDN helps reduce systemic inflammation, modulate immune responses, and improve symptom control, with potential neuroprotective and mood-enhancing effects.

medications.name: Larazotide (AT-1001)
medications.description: Larazotide (AT-1001) is an oral peptide that helps regulate intestinal permeability by modulating tight junctions in the gut lining. It is primarily researched for its role in managing leaky gut syndrome, celiac disease, and other inflammatory gut disorders. By preventing the breakdown of tight junctions, Larazotide supports gut barrier integrity, reduces inflammation, and may help mitigate symptoms related to increased intestinal permeability.
medications.indication: Larazotide (AT-1001) 500mcg is indicated for individuals with conditions linked to increased intestinal permeability, such as celiac disease, leaky gut syndrome, inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), and autoimmune disorders. By modulating tight junctions in the gut lining, it helps reduce inflammation, support barrier integrity, and mitigate symptoms like bloating, brain fog, and digestive discomfort. It may also benefit metabolic and neurological conditions related to gut health, making it a promising adjunct therapy for those with chronic inflammation and immune dysregulation.

medications.name: Oral BPC-KPV
medications.description: Oral BPC-KPV is a peptide-based therapy that combines BPC-157, known for its regenerative and anti-inflammatory properties, with KPV, a potent tripeptide derived from alpha-melanocyte-stimulating hormone (α-MSH) that helps modulate immune response and reduce inflammation. This combination is designed to support gut health, tissue repair, and immune regulation, making it a promising option for individuals with gastrointestinal disorders, inflammatory conditions, and musculoskeletal injuries.
medications.indication: Oral BPC-KPV is indicated for individuals seeking support for gut health, immune modulation, and tissue repair. It is commonly used for conditions such as inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), leaky gut syndrome, gastritis, and other gastrointestinal disorders, as well as chronic inflammation and musculoskeletal injuries. By reducing inflammation, promoting cellular repair, and enhancing gut barrier integrity, BPC-KPV may aid in recovery from injury, optimize gut function, and support overall systemic healing.

medications.name: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN)
medications.description: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN) is a compounded formulation of naltrexone, an opioid receptor antagonist, typically dosed between 0.5 mg and 4.5 mg. Unlike standard naltrexone dosing used for addiction treatment, LDN works by transiently blocking opioid receptors, leading to a rebound increase in endogenous endorphin and enkephalin production. This modulation of the immune system and inflammation pathways has shown therapeutic benefits in a range of chronic conditions.
medications.indication: Indicated for the management of autoimmune disorders, chronic pain syndromes, and inflammatory conditions. It is particularly beneficial for conditions such as multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis, Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, fibromyalgia, or irritable bowel syndrome. LDN helps reduce systemic inflammation, modulate immune responses, and improve symptom control, with potential neuroprotective and mood-enhancing effects.

tests.name: DUTCH Complete™ Test
tests.description: The DUTCH Complete™ Test (Dried Urine Test for Comprehensive Hormones) is an advanced hormone panel that provides a detailed analysis of sex hormones, adrenal function, and their metabolites. Using dried urine samples collected over a 24-hour period, this test offers a comprehensive assessment of hormonal balance, metabolism, and overall endocrine health. It measures cortisol patterns, sex hormones, melatonin, and organic acid markers to provide insights into stress response, hormone detoxification, and overall well-being.
tests.indication: The DUTCH Complete™ Test is indicated for individuals experiencing symptoms related to hormone imbalance, adrenal dysfunction, and metabolic concerns, including fatigue, mood swings, weight fluctuations, irregular menstrual cycles, low libido, and sleep disturbances. It is particularly beneficial for assessing adrenal health, evaluating estrogen metabolism, and monitoring hormone therapy. This test provides actionable insights for optimizing hormonal balance, improving stress resilience, and enhancing overall wellness.

medications.name: 5-Amino 1MQ
medications.description: 5-Amino-1MQ is a small molecule peptide that acts as an inhibitor of the enzyme nicotinamide N-methyltransferase (NNMT), which plays a role in cellular metabolism and energy regulation. By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.
medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.name: B.F.R.
medications.description: Blood Flow Restriction Therapy
medications.indication:
Blood flow restriction therapy (BFR) is a rehabilitation technique that uses a specialized cuff to partially restrict venous outflow while maintaining arterial inflow to a limb during low-intensity exercise.
This creates a metabolically stressful environment that stimulates muscle hypertrophy and strength gains similar to high-load resistance training, but with significantly less mechanical stress on joints and tissues.

tests.indication: Includes Total & Free Testosterone (LC/MS), Estradiol (LC/MS), SHBG, Progesterone, Prolactin, Cortisol, LH, FSH, DHEA-S, TSH, Free T3, Free T4, IGF-1, Lipid Panel, ApoB, Lipoprotein (a), Ferritin, HbA1c, CBC, Metabolic Panel, Fasting Insulin, GGT, Vitamin D, Iron Panel, and hsCRP.

medications.name: 5-Amino 1MQ
medications.description: 5-Amino-1MQ is a small molecule peptide that acts as an inhibitor of the enzyme nicotinamide N-methyltransferase (NNMT), which plays a role in cellular metabolism and energy regulation. By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.
medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.name: Estrogen Replacement
medications.description: Estrogen Therapies offer a tailored approach to supporting hormonal balance, enhancing vitality, and improving overall well-being.
medications.indication: Estrogen therapy helps alleviate symptoms of hormonal imbalances and promotes optimal health for a better quality of life.

medications.name: Glutathione
medications.description: Glutathione is a powerful antioxidant naturally produced in the body that plays a crucial role in detoxification, immune function, and cellular repair. It neutralizes harmful free radicals, reduces oxidative stress, and supports liver health, making it essential for overall wellness and anti-aging.
medications.indication: Glutathione helps brighten skin tone, reduce inflammation, and enhance recovery from physical stress. Widely studied for its benefits, it is a cornerstone of cellular defense and optimal health.

medications.name: NAD+
medications.description: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience. NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration.
medications.indication: Supports cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: Progesterone
medications.description: Progesterone Therapy provides a personalized solution to support hormonal balance, improve mood, and enhance overall well-being.
medications.indication: Progesterone therapy helps regulate cycles, reduce stress, and promote optimal hormonal health.

medications.name: Tesamorelin
medications.description: A peptide therapy that boosts natural growth hormone production.
medications.indication: Achieve targeted fat loss and enhanced metabolic health with Tesamorelin. Known for its ability to reduce stubborn visceral fat, it supports improved body composition, muscle definition, and energy.

supplements.name: Zinc
supplements.description: Zinc supports hormone balance, thyroid function, immune health, and skin repair. It’s also key for healthy ovulation and helps your body convert thyroid hormones efficiently.
supplements.indication: Low zinc can contribute to hair shedding, fatigue, slow healing, or hormone imbalance.

supplements.name: Health Essential Bundle (Multi, Vitamin D, Omega)
supplements.description: Support your health with this essential trio: Vitamin D3 + K2 for strong bones, immunity, and mood balance, a high-quality multivitamin to fill nutritional gaps, and Omega-3s for heart, brain, and anti-inflammatory support. Optimize your wellness with these foundational nutrients!
supplements.indication: Designed to support bone strength, immune function, heart health, and overall vitality.

supplements.name: Magnesium
supplements.description: An essential mineral that supports muscle function, energy production, nerve health, and sleep quality.
supplements.indication: Stress depletes magnesium levels, impairing relaxation, sleep, and muscle function. Magnesium helps regulate the nervous system, reduce cortisol, and promote a calm, balanced mood.

supplements.name: Selenium
supplements.description: Selenium is essential for thyroid function as it helps convert inactive thyroid hormone (T4) into its active form (T3) and protects the thyroid gland from oxidative damage through its role in antioxidant enzymes like glutathione peroxidase. A deficiency in selenium can impair thyroid hormone metabolism and increase the risk of thyroid disorders, including hypothyroidism and Hashimoto’s thyroiditis.
supplements.indication: Selenium is indicated for individuals seeking to support healthy immune function, protect normal cell activity from oxidative stress, and promote overall cardiovascular and cellular health.

supplements.name: Thyroid Support Bundle
supplements.description: A comprehensive supplement package designed to support thyroid function.
supplements.indication: Optimize your thyroid function with our Thyroid Support Bundle, featuring Selenium, D3 Liquid, and more.

medications.description: GHK-Cu Peptide is a powerful tripeptide bonded with copper ions, known for its ability to stimulate collagen production, support tissue repair, and combat signs of aging. Backed by decades of scientific research, GHK-Cu is safe for all skin types and a key component in anti-aging and regenerative treatments.

Additionally, it accelerates wound healing, reduces inflammation, and strengthens antioxidant defenses, making it ideal for post-procedure recovery and calming irritated skin.

medications.name: Selank
medications.description: A synthetic peptide developed as an analog of the naturally occurring immunomodulatory peptide tuftsin. Selank exhibits pronounced anxiolytic (anti-anxiety) effects without the sedative and dependency side effects commonly associated with traditional tranquilizers. Additionally, it has demonstrated nootropic properties, enhancing cognitive functions such as memory and learning.
medications.indication: Selank is used to support anxiety relief, cognitive enhancement, and stress management. This synthetic peptide promotes a calming effect without sedation, improves memory and focus, and helps regulate the body's stress response for overall mental well-being.

medications.indication: Treatment of hypoactive sexual desire disorder (HSDD) in premenopausal women and is used off-label in both men and women to enhance libido, arousal, and sexual satisfaction. medications.name: 5-Amino 1MQ
medications.description: 5-Amino-1MQ is a small molecule peptide that acts as an inhibitor of the enzyme nicotinamide N-methyltransferase (NNMT), which plays a role in cellular metabolism and energy regulation. By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.
medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.name: BPC-157
medications.description: BPC-157 Therapy offers cutting-edge treatment designed to support healing, recovery, and overall wellness.
medications.indication: BPC-157 therapy promotes tissue repair, reduces inflammation, and enhances recovery from injuries or physical strain.

medications.name: DHEA
medications.description: A hormone produced by the adrenal glands. It serves as a precursor to sex hormones like testosterone and estrogen and counterbalances cortisol, the stress hormone.
medications.indication: Restores hormonal balance, boosts energy, mood, and sexual health. Enhances stress resilience, immunity, and overall well-being, essential for longevity and performance optimization.

medications.name: GHK-Cu Peptide Treatment
medications.description: GHK-Cu Peptide is a powerful tripeptide bonded with copper ions, known for its ability to stimulate collagen production, support tissue repair, and combat signs of aging. Backed by decades of scientific research, GHK-Cu is safe for all skin types and a key component in anti-aging and regenerative treatments.
medications.indication: Clinically researched, it improves skin elasticity, reduces wrinkles, balances pigmentation, and promotes hair follicle repair for thicker, healthier hair. Additionally, it accelerates wound healing, reduces inflammation, and strengthens antioxidant defenses, making it ideal for post-procedure recovery and calming irritated skin.

medications.name: Glutathione
medications.description: Glutathione is a powerful antioxidant naturally produced in the body that plays a crucial role in detoxification, immune function, and cellular repair. It neutralizes harmful free radicals, reduces oxidative stress, and supports liver health, making it essential for overall wellness and anti-aging.
medications.indication: Glutathione helps brighten skin tone, reduce inflammation, and enhance recovery from physical stress. Widely studied for its benefits, it is a cornerstone of cellular defense and optimal health.

medications.name: MOTS-c
medications.description: MOTS-c is a mitochondrial-derived peptide composed of 16 amino acids, encoded within the mitochondrial genome. It regulates metabolic homeostasis, cellular energy production, and mitochondrial function by activating AMPK (AMP-activated protein kinase), a critical energy-sensing enzyme involved in cellular metabolism, insulin sensitivity, fat oxidation, and glucose uptake.
medications.indication: Supports metabolic health, enhances mitochondrial function, and improves energy production. Indicated for patients with metabolic dysfunction, insulin resistance, weight loss resistance, or chronic fatigue. MOTS-c improves glucose utilization, increases fat oxidation, reduces inflammation, and supports healthy aging and exercise recovery.

medications.name: NAD+
medications.description: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience. NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration.
medications.indication: Supports cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: PT-141 (Bremelanotide)
medications.description: PT-141 (Bremelanotide) is a synthetic peptide used to enhance sexual arousal and libido in both men and women. Unlike other sexual function medications that target blood flow (like Viagra), PT-141 acts directly on the central nervous system, specifically the hypothalamus, to stimulate desire.
medications.indication: Treatment of hypoactive sexual desire disorder (HSDD) in premenopausal women and is used off-label in both men and women to enhance libido, arousal, and sexual satisfaction. In functional medicine, it is commonly prescribed for individuals experiencing low sexual desire, erectile dysfunction, or arousal difficulties, including those related to SSRI use or hormonal imbalance.

medications.name: TB-400 / TB-500
medications.description: TB-400/500 is a synthetic fragment of thymosin beta-4 (specifically the 17-23 segment), designed to replicate its active region. Both are involved in actin regulation and tissue repair. TB-500 Therapy provides advanced treatment designed to enhance recovery, promote healing, and support overall physical performance.
medications.indication: TB-400/500 therapy helps reduce inflammation, accelerate tissue repair, and improve endurance, making it an ideal choice for those seeking optimal recovery and resilience.
